short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage, create, modify, paste and use your tailor-made templates easily with our tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy tool to manage templates and get them saved on your own browser. Easy to use, easy to paste and to manage. You are able to create, edit, delete and change order of your templates. This tool will save you time on the office when you are sending emails or copying and pasting the same text constantly.  This tool will help you to increase the productivity at work. All information is saved on the extension is saved locally.  

The tool is able to save format, text, links and tables. Unfortunately is not yet able to save images that are saved locally. Even though, is possible to use it with images linked online.
